scripts.cye2e: rm -rf src/backend_server/test && mkdir src/backend_server/test && npm run dev & make -C src/backend_server local_test & cypress open
scripts.cye2etest: rm -rf src/backend_server/test && mkdir src/backend_server/test && npm run dev & make -C src/backend_server test & cypress run
scripts.cye2e_local: rm -rf src/backend_server/test && mkdir src/backend_server/test && npm run dev & make -C src/backend_server test & cypress run  --spec 'cypress\e2e\spec.cy.ts'
